questions.question: What type of change is 'HELP'?
options: A new feature/Minor Change that should be added to a new version section (e.g., 1.5.0)
A bugfix/Patch Change that should be added to the existing 1.4.0 section

questions.question: Where in the CHANGELOG should 'HELP' be added?
options: As a new top-level version section (for an unreleased version)
To the existing 1.4.0 Minor Changes section

questions.question: What is the complete text/description for the 'HELP' entry?
options: Just the word 'HELP' alone as a bullet point
'Add HELP command/functionality' or similar descriptive text

answers.selectedOption: A new feature/Minor Change that should be added to a new version section (e.g., 1.5.0)
As a new top-level version section (for an unreleased version)
